Cleaning up the code some more.
Introducing wrapper classes for making AJAX View requests more "explicit" / "type-safe", especially in the client methods, such as "getViewFromServer" and alike. So that the types tell what the data means.

Wednesday, 24 July 2019 4.27.20 :
YEEEESSSS !!!!
Mission accomplisssssshed !!!
The brand new shineyyy ViewCache WORKS !!! YEEESSS !
need to look into the entity cache too... maybe that got messed up in the process.. the text field of LineText looks a bit ... "dead"

Wednesday, 24 July 2019 4.48.47
- the app works, the entity cache works - the view cache works
- the app freezes if the net drops, no big deal, we do not deal with this unhappy path now, maybe later, maybe in my next life
- cache invalidation is non existent, but we are also not writing anything, so until then, cache validation is not a big issue
- next step: load in some more complex queries, such as : List of User's :) , and maybe do a User CRUD feature :)

Wednesday, 24 July 2019 4.48.47
- the app works, the entity cache works - the view cache works
- the app freezes if the net drops, no big deal, we do not deal with this unhappy path now, maybe later, maybe in my next life
- cache invalidation is non existent, but we are also not writing anything, so until then, cache validation is not a big issue
- next step: load in some more complex queries, such as : List of User's :) , and maybe do a User CRUD feature :)
